Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class PlayerController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.PlayerController
public class PlayerController
extends java.lang.Object
PlayerController handles the players in the current match.

    • getNextPlayer

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn()
      This method is called when a player ends his turn. The next player in the list will become the current player and will be set to active.

    • addPlayer

      public java.util.List<Error> addPlayer​(Player player)
      This method is called when a new player joins the match.
      Parameters:
      player - Player that will be added
      Returns:
      A list of errors (if present): -username not available -worker color not available -too many players in game
